import Form from 'react-bootstrap/Form'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; function PagesName({addName}) { const [name, setName] = useState(''); const [city, setCity] = useState(''); const [petname, setPetname] = useState(''); const onSubmit = (e) => { e.preventDefault() if(!name) { alert('Please add a name') return } addName({name, city}) setName('') setCity('') setPetname('') } return (
); } export default PagesName;
Change Display Name: setName(e.target.value)}/>
Your Location: setCity(e.target.value)}/>
Pet Name: setPetname(e.target.value)}/>
